title: First Look: Sony XBR55X900E
description:
In this video we take a look at the brand new Sony XBR55X900E.  For more details or to place an order make sure to check it out at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/product/108474/Sony-55-Black-Ultra-HD-4K-HDR-LED-Smart-HDTV-XBR55X900E.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=XBR55X900E_2017033&utm_medium=video 

Features:
Reality revealed with X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO
The 4K HDR Processor X1™ with Object-based HDR remaster and Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR technology gives pure colors at higher brightness levels for truly natural pictures. See everything you watch come to life with greater depth, detail, and texture
Uncover the detail with 4K HDR 
Explore new worlds with Android TV™ 
TRILUMINOS™ Display: Extra colors, extra brilliance 
Rediscover every detail with 4K X-Reality™ PRO
Narrow aluminum frame 
Cable management
Cable-free front 
Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth 
Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR
Object-based HDR remaster 
Content Bar: find everything fast 
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices 
Say what you want to see with voice search 
Made to listen: ClearAudio+ 
Google Play™: A world of content and apps 
DSEE restores detail to your digital music 
Cinematic S-Force Front Surround 
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies 
Bluetooth connectivity for easy streaming 
Enrich your viewing with the TV SideView app 
IR Blaster – control everything with one remote
